official_name = }} Foxton is a town in the Horowhenua District, New Zealand. It is 30 kilometers southwest of Palmerston North and 18 kilometers north of Levin. It is located on State Highway 1 and is near the coastal settlement of Foxton Beach. It has two primary schools and one high school situated in the town. == References == Category:Towns in Horizons Category:Horowhenua District
title: Foxton, New Zealand
